clinical_study.brief_title: An Open-label Trial to Evaluate the Safety of an Essential Oil Infused Perineal Towel
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-label Trial to Evaluate the Safety of an Essential Oil Infused Perineal Towel - WIPEAWAY

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety (absence of skin irritation) of a feminine hygiene product for perineal hygiene prior to undertaking a clinical effectiveness trial. The feminine hygiene towel or wipe is an anti-bacterial Natural Health Product solution.

detailed_description.textblock: The design of the trial will be open-label and uncontrolled.

clinical_study.why_stopped: The company responsible for funding has filed for bankruptcy

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants without any adverse events as a measure of safety

secondary_outcome.measure: Ease of use of the perineal hygiene wipe by the participants on a daily basis
Self-reported comfort score on a scale of 1 to 10

arm_group.description: Essential oils infused Perineal Hygiene wipe

intervention.intervention_name: Essential oils infused Perineal Hygiene wipe
intervention.description: Each participant will be asked to complete a treatment period of one month's duration. At the start of the study, the participants will be asked to fill-out a baseline questionnaire and will be given a month's supply of the perineal hygiene towel with instructions about its use. At day 15, 30 and 45 follow-ups will be conducted.
